mb.web
Class WebThreadClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      mb.web.WebThread
          mb.web.WebThreadClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebThreadRemoteClient, WebThreadServerClient
public abstract class WebThreadClient
extends WebThread

Abstract parent of server-side client and remote client. Contains common methods.

Author:
mb

Constructor Detail

WebThreadClient

public WebThreadClient(java.lang.String prefix,
                       java.net.Socket socket)
                throws java.io.IOException
Constructs an instance using a ready socket. Used when initialising a server client. Communication is done via send() and listen() methods.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - when connection could not be established before timeout

Throws:

Method Detail

disconnect

public void disconnect()
This method removes this client from the server's list, stops communication etc. Simply, it does exactly what its name indicates.
